title: Drawing, "Brown Palace Hotel: Ninth Floor Plan and Furniture Layout", 1936
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center: SECTION OF 9TH FLOOR BROWN PALACE HOTEL - SHOWING FURNITURE AND INDICATING VARIOUS TREATMENTS SCALE 1/4" = 1'/HAVENS INTERIORS CONSULTANT INTERIOR ARCHITECTS AND DECORATORS; instructions, descriptions, materials throughout
description: Floor plan and furniture layout with descriptions of materials, and various treatments of 9th floor. Space is adjacent to present ballroom at lower left, hallway and elevator shaft at lower center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Brown Palace Hotel: Ninth Floor Plan and Furniture Layout", 1936.
1936. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-412.
